1.a: gravity- down; normal force - up; applied force -right; friction-left
1.b: The block moves because maximum static friction is 53.6 and applied force is 60 N; applied force is greater than static friction
1.c: down - 76.5 N; up - 76.5 N; right - 60.0 N; left - 34.4 N; explain that friction is kinetic friction

2.a: gravity- down; normal force - up; applied force -right; friction-left
2.b: maximum static friction = 46.7 N; applied force = 40 N; the box does not move
